title: Too many AFKs in ARAM
body: In recent games of just trying to get first win of the day, there has been a lot of afk members in aram and it is cause me to waste more time trying to play for a win of the day.

replies.body: Not to mention the massive amount of BOT PLAYERS
not playing bots for daily bonus, you deserve to lose for your greed. play interm bots for around 200ip after 20 minutes or play kat in easy bots and get minimum 175 after winning at any time
ARAM isn't really to be taken too seriously. I mean if you want an easy first win of the day play bots.
